extracted-table.table-caption: Comparison of fALFF Between the Tobacco-Dependent and Control Groups

caption.p: Comparison of fALFF Between the Tobacco-Dependent and Control Groups

fn.p: Notes: P < 0.01, cluster ≥ 41 voxels, threshold = 2.7116, corrected using Alphasim. Brodmann area: Brodmann partitioning is a system that divides the cerebral cortex into a series of anatomical regions based on cellular structure. Here, it represents the BA brain region where the peak coordinates are located.

Brodmann area: Brodmann partitioning is a system that divides the cerebral cortex into a series of anatomical regions based on cellular structure.
